metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19043 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: A memory leak in the i40e_setup_macvlans() function indrivers/net/ethernet/intel/i40e/i40e_main.c in the Linux kernel through5.3.11 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption)by triggering i40e_setup_channel() failures, aka CID-27d461333459.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
